channel.title: [delta] server restart countdown timer help [delta]
channel.description:
ive jsut added a auto restarter to my server and i dont know how but i want to add a ingame countdowntimer till the server gets restart just a timer i dont want it to do anything when timer counts 0.
because i was hoping it would start counting down as soon as the server comes online server restarter is every 60minutes so when u restart run my server id just put a 60minute timer on it
public void playersOnline_and_Uptime() { sendFrame126("@or1@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" !", 7332); sendFrame126("@or1@uptime: @gre@"+ (server.uptime / 2 / 60) +" Mins", 7333);
this is a server uptime timer wodnering if this can be edited to be above chat screen in game window? it currently apears in quest tab
i need help please any1 know how to do this? im using delta 317

item.title: [delta] server restart countdown timer help [delta]
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

ive jsut added a auto restarter to my server and i dont know how but i want to add a ingame countdowntimer till the server gets restart just a timer i dont want it to do anything when timer counts 0.

because i was hoping it would start counting down as soon as the server comes online
server restarter is every 60minutes
so when u restart run my server id just put a 60minute timer on it

public void playersOnline_and_Uptime() {
sendFrame126("@or1@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" !", 7332);
sendFrame126("@or1@uptime: @gre@"+ (server.uptime / 2 / 60) +" Mins", 7333);

this is a server uptime timer wodnering if this can be edited to be above chat screen in game window?
it currently apears in quest tab

i need help please any1 know how to do this?
im using delta 317

Read full topic
